org.apache.hivemind.impl
Class SymbolExpanderImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hivemind.impl.SymbolExpanderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SymbolExpander
public class SymbolExpanderImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements SymbolExpander

A simple parser used to identify symbols in a string and expand them via a SymbolSource.

Author:
Howard Lewis Ship

Method Detail

valueForSymbol

public java.lang.String valueForSymbol(java.lang.String name)
Description copied from interface: SymbolExpander
Returns the value for the symbol, if this source can provide one. Iterates all known SymbolSources. Returns null if no source can provide a value.

Specified by:
valueForSymbol in interface SymbolExpander

expandSymbols

public java.lang.String expandSymbols(java.lang.String text,
                                      org.apache.hivemind.Location location)
Description copied from interface: SymbolExpander

Identifies symbols in the text and expands them, using the SymbolSource. Returns the modified text. May return text if text does not contain any symbols.

Specified by:
expandSymbols in interface SymbolExpander
Parameters:
text - the text to scan
location - the location to report errors (undefined symbols)
See Also:
SymbolExpander.expandSymbols(java.lang.String, org.apache.hivemind.Location)
